title: "Mac Mini with Apple’s new M1 chip will ship for $100 less than the previous model"
excerpt: "Apple announced a bunch of machines powered by its first chip, M1. But there was only one desktop machine announced, a new Mac Mini. The new machine costs just $699  — $100 less than its current Intel-based version with a quad-core CPU."
